name: RiseGardens
0:
”Alexa, open Rise Gardens”
”Alexa, ask Rise Gardens how is my garden doing”
”Alexa, ask Rise Gardens to start care”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: rise gardens
des: Alexa can help you with your Rise Garden and growing great produce. Alexa can remind you when to perform care and how to do it. Alexa can tell you when its time to harvest and how your garden is doing. Alexa makes a great assistant for you when gardening with a Rise Garden smart indoor hydroponic garden! Use your Rise App credentials to login!
